title: Did Sylvester Stallone's killer sell his dog for $25?
subtitle: Sly sold his dog 25 bucks so he could pay for it before he hit him with Rocky, and then bought it 15,000 bucks.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Sylvester Stallone sold his dog $25 so he could pay for it before Rocky hit him and then bought it $15,000.
